title: So, there was this loner in my class...
body:
He kept isolating himself for no reason and no one knew much about him.

During a Group Project, the teacher paired him with the hot but annoying girl in the other class.

She was really annoyed by it and basically treated him like a slave, as she didn't care much for her grades anyway.

One day, they started fighting for some reason and she told him "Fuck you, you gay ass motherfucker"

To which he replied "Take of your clothes and I'll show you how much of a man I am"

And so she did.

And he put them on.

And he looked fabulous.
